CustomField.description: This field is manually populated. If enabled, this field prevents the user from selecting the associated route from left navigation or subnavigation if they are on a route of lower order. The user can still navigate backwards to any route with these navigation options. If disabled, the user is not prevented from using these navigation options.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Controls ability to use forward routing functionality.
CustomField.label: Is Forward Navigation Disabled
